es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.reranking.global.swap.comm.gini.degree.AbstractCommunityDegreeGiniComplement<U>
Type Parameters:
U - Type of the users.
All Implemented Interfaces:
GlobalReranker<U,​U>
Direct Known Subclasses:
CompleteCommunityDegreeGiniComplement, InterCommunityDegreeGiniComplement, SizeNormalizedCompleteCommunityDegreeGiniComplement, SizeNormalizedInterCommunityDegreeGiniComplement
public abstract class AbstractCommunityDegreeGiniComplement<U>
extends CommunityReranker<U>
Swap reranker for promoting the balance in the degree distribution for the different communities.
Author:
Javier Sanz-Cruzado (javier.sanz-cruzado@uam.es), Pablo Castells (pablo.castells@uam.es)

      Indicates if the reranker promotes the links.

  • Constructor Details

    • AbstractCommunityDegreeGiniComplement

      public AbstractCommunityDegreeGiniComplement​(double lambda, int cutoff, java.util.function.Supplier<Normalizer<U>> norm, Graph<U> graph, Communities<U> communities, boolean selfloops, boolean complete, boolean outer, EdgeOrientation orientation)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      lambda - establishes the trade-off between the value of the Gini Index and the original score
      cutoff - the maximum number of contacts in the definitive rankings.
      norm - the normalization scheme.
      graph - the original graph.
      communities - the relation between communities and users in the graph.
      orientation - the orientation of the community degree to take.
      complete - true if we use intra-community links, false if not.
      selfloops - true if selfloops are allowed, false if they are not.
      outer - true if we want to force links to go outside communities.

    • communityValue

      protected abstract double communityValue​(int comm, double degree)
      Given the effective degree for the reranker, and the community, this function computes the value of this community, to store it.
      Parameters:
      comm - the community.
      degree - the effective degree.
      Returns:
      the real value for that community.
